Description: Blue glazed composition nefer-amulet; suspension ring at either end(both damaged): a jewellery element.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.87
Bibliographic references: Shaw & Nicholson 1995 / British Museum Dictionary of Ancient Egypt (p198)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1989 Jun-Sep, Swaffham Museum, Wonderful Things! The Howard Carter Exhibition
Acquisition name: Donated by: Henry Herbert, 7th Earl of Carnarvon
